titleStmt.title: The mirrour of humilitie: or Two eloquent and acute discourses vpon the natiuitie and passion of Christ full of diuine and excellent meditations and sentences. Published first in Latine by the worthy author Daniel Heinsius, and since done into English, by I.H. Master of Arts in Mag. Coll. Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Heinsius, Daniel, 1580-1655.

titleStmt.title: The mirrour of humilitie: or Two eloquent and acute discourses vpon the natiuitie and passion of Christ full of diuine and excellent meditations and sentences. Published first in Latine by the worthy author Daniel Heinsius, and since done into English, by I.H. Master of Arts in Mag. Coll. Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Heinsius, Daniel, 1580-1655.
Harmar, John, 1594?-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bernard Alsop, and are to be solde at his house by Saint Annes Church neere Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: I.H. = John Harmer, the younger, who signed the translator's dedication: Io: Harmer.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
